decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development would adversely impact upon the amenity of the existing occupants of neighbouring properties at No. 19 The Avenue, in terms of outlook and being visually overbearing. The development would therefore fail to comply with the National Planning Policy Framework (2021),  policy D3.D(7) of The London Plan (2021), policy, DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013), the adopted Supplementary Planning Document Residential Design Guide (2010) and would therefore not  be within the tolerances of Condition A.A.2(3)(a)(i) of Class AA of Part 1, Schedule 2 of the General Permitted Development Order (2015) as amended.

Reason : 1 - The proposed development would adversely impact upon the amenity of the existing occupants of neighbouring properties at No. 19 The Avenue, in terms of outlook and being visually overbearing. The development would therefore fail to comply with the National Planning Policy Framework (2021),  policy D3.D(7) of The London Plan (2021), policy, DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013), the adopted Supplementary Planning Document Residential Design Guide (2010) and would therefore not  be within the tolerances of Condition A.A.2(3)(a)(i) of Class AA of Part 1, Schedule 2 of the General Permitted Development Order (2015) as amended.

description: Additional Storey  (height 2.6m) to a dwellinghouse - maximum overall height 9.30m (Prior approval of impact on the amenity of any adjoining premises; the external appearance of the dwellinghouse; air traffic and defence asset impacts and impact on a protected view)
